Text:
Ooops.  I changed the container on the special music video, to MP4, and forgot to change the description .
Being an MP4 it should play on more devices and just changing the container doesn't lose any quality (I actually think somebody did the reverse to it before it was given to me ^_^  ).

Awesome thanks!

(Curiously, season four is supposed to be the full 26 episodes like one and two, but I can’t find anything about why season three was half-length.) ಠ_ఠ
Ah, no wasted disk space for the superstition that is 720/1080p.  I just wish torrents allowed renaming the files on your computer to match each user's personal conventions.
Cindy can't wait for Equestria Girls!
